title: Google Acknowledges Annoying Pixel 7 Pro Problem
description: A fix for a long-standing Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro problem is on its way.

title: With The Right Music, This Will Only Hurt A Little Bit
description: A research study carried out during a music festival found that people feel less pain when they listen to a song they like.

title: ActivTrak Provides Insights, Not Surveillance, To Maximize Employee Productivity
description: Vice President and Principal Analyst, Melody Brue, dives in as there has been much news recently about "tattleware"—software to enable the practice of monitoring employees to catch them off track or engaging in other activities while on the clock.

title: Race-Based Medicine Contributes To Civil Rights Violations, According To New Analysis
description: A recent paper in the Stanford Technology Law Review examines how compassionate medical release decisions for incarcerated people were guided by a practice that lead to systemic underdiagnosis and under-staging of CKD in Black people.

title: A New Kind Of Services Firm
description: Service companies, where one firm takes over a set of duties that used to be done in-house, is quite common. But a new form of supply chain service is emerging that blends inventory financial services with supply chain resilience.

title: This Is How How AI Is Helping Monitor And Count Puffins
description: On the 140-acre Isle of May, off the coast of Scotland, a five year project is underway to use artificial intelligence to count and monitor Atlantic Puffins as they return to the Island for the 2023 breeding season.

title: Russian Journalist Gets 6 Years In Penal Colony For ‘Fake News’ On Social Media
description: Maria Ponomarenko, a Russian journalist who was jailed back in April 2022 on charges of disseminating  “knowingly false information” on social media about the war in Ukraine, has been sentenced to six years in a penal colony, according to a new report from Amnesty International.

title: 14 Revealing Questions To Ask When Prioritizing Multiple Tech Projects
description: Taking the time to decide which projects should be completed first can help your team work more efficiently and provide the most benefits to your company and customers.

title: The Ocean Cleanup Readies Launch of System 03, With Three Times The Plastic-Collecting Power
description: The Ocean Cleanup plans to use the donation from Airbnb cofounder Joe Gebbia to support the launch later this year of System 03, the largest iteration yet of its ocean cleaning system, targeting a Great Pacific Garbage Patch that covers an area twice as big as Texas.

title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare II’s Mid-Season 6v6 Mystery Map Looks Awesome

And after years of record-high inflation, who can blame consumers for being less brand loyal and more price conscious than before? As a result, retailers that get pricing right and communicate value are in the driver’s seat.
